VoiceList.Entry: Cloud “It's the Keystone…”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh. Long time no see,boy. Hmm? You like that,huh?”
Dio “I got it from the guy in a little shack south of here,past the 'River'.”
Dio “If you want to know more, go there and talk to him.”
Cloud “Can you let me borrow this?”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh. Sorry,but it's not for rent.”
Dio “Hmm.”
“Since you've been good to me in the past,I CAN let you have it on one condition.”
Cloud “One condition?”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh. Entertain me!”
Dio “Hoo boy!”
Dio “I see… Then let's pretend that this never happened.”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh! So! You want the Keystone,right? How 'bout entertaining me first?”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh. Nothing all that difficult.”
“This is the Battle Arena. Show me your fighting skills. Just you,boy. I'm expecting a good fight!”
Dio “That's the best you could do? Well,a promise is a promise. Go ahead,take it.”
Dio “Hmm,you did pretty well, young man!
“Good,it's a promise, so go ahead and take it. I'll give this to you too.”
Dio “Heh,heh,heh! Well done,young man! And,as I promised,
“you can take it. Oh,and I'll give you this too.”
Dio “We shall meet again! Heh,heh,heh.”
Aeris “With this, We can get into the Temple of the Ancients. Let's go,Cloud!”
Tifa “With this Key Materia, We can get in to the Temple of the Ancients. Let's go,Cloud!”
Barret “This'll get us into the Temple of the Ancients,right?”
